profile.name: Alex
profile.title: Senior Software Engineer at Rokubun
profile.description:
As a Software Engineer my aim is to create innovative products that can change the way people access information.

I have been working in national and international projects involving multiple technologies, adapting myself to the requirements of each new task and learning new languages and methodologies.
I worked for 3 years as a Java Software Engineer including development of Oracle PLSQL, I spent 2 years as a Full Stack Software Engineer with the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, AngularJS and NodeJS) developing a web application for the visualisation of Geospatial data. Afterwards, I worked on the design and development of the data exploitation tools for the new launch vehicle of the European Space Agency, the Ariane 6. Currently I am putting my efforts on the processing platform of Rokubun providing precise and affordable navigation solutions.

In my free time, I am passionate about Science and new technologies.

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJ5TCOcRaYpBIRCmZHTz37sEQ)

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription: My ideal job would allow me to continue learning but at the same time, I can help ti improve the usage of the product we are building. I want to build products the user enjoys using them. It does not matter if the user is another developer or a person using a service.
